name: Blobby (itch) (lildyll)
description:
An evil blobby mech has taken your wife! You must traverse the dangerous ocean floors to get her back! Talk to clams, stomp on fish, and purchase upgrades to make Blobby even stronger! Can you find all the secrets?

All assets were created and programmed by me, lildyll. This game was made for a school project and will likely be expanded on in the future. This game is in beta so if you find any bugs, have any issues, or have any recommendations please leave them down below!

Thank you for playing!

-NOTE-
F10 does not work for full screen and will crash the game.
